评论概述: Cute overall, cut could be slightly better
评论详情: Overall this is a really cute sweater. I ordered my usual size, small, and it fits slightly oversized as expected. The color is accurate to the picture as well. However, the v neck is much higher than in the photo and the sweater would definitely look nicer with a deeper v. Also the bell sleeves aren’t as defined as in the picture, but more of a wide sleeve all the way down so that the flare isn’t as noticeable.

评论概述: Don't normally buy clothes on amazon.  Very pleased!
评论详情: So I normally don't buy clothes on Amazon, or if I do I have very low, low expectations for it.  This is a really cute top and true to how it's described and pictured.  I bought white and green.  The white is white, but not the whitest white I've ever seen.  On its own it looks white, but against something else white it looks VERY slightly cream white.  Not a big deal, but something to point out if you're hoping to wear it against white shorts or something.  The green is a lovely turquoise--more vibrant than it appears on the website.And even though it's an open knit it's pretty modest in my opinion.  The holes are small enough and close together that you're not seeing anything other than skin color through it.  I don't bare my midriff but I am wearing it with a cropped cami bra so I can stay cool today and I don't feel the least bit self conscious.No one is going to think this is expensive, but I think it's on par with something you could find at Express or White House/Black Market.  Really cute, I'm going back for more colors.

I love this lacy little sweater. I wear it in summer over a cami - it covers me up for the office but keeps me nice and cool. It looks great with skinny jeans or a long flowing skirt. The sweater is quite soft, and heavy enough in weight to drape nicely. I also have the long sleeved version, and I love both styles.
I absolutely love these sweaters.They are perfect for summer.I bought more than one color because they're so comfortable and they look so stylish.
It was a lighter shade than stated and the description stated it was adjustable to allow more or less coverage and it is not
Very good quality. Super cute and comfy!

I wore this top when I went on a trip to Europe in the spring. It was a little chilly in the early mornings/night and warm in the day time, this top was perfect! It pairs well with pants or shorts and it’s super cute on. I will buy again in another color.
Very pretty color and well made

Certainly kept this, wish I would’ve size down one size so I do think it runs a little big. The quality is amazing. The color is spot on to the pictures. Such a great fit if you like a little flowy get your true to size otherwise size down super super cute. The price is great to.

评论概述: It's great! Perfect for cool summer nights.
Got it in three colors and two sizes
评论详情: First up, size and shape in the hopes it helps someone else!  I’m 5’5” and 125lbs; hippy and bosomy. The sweater itself is comfortable, adorable, and made of a really nice thread that is soft to the touch and wears well.  If you like the way it looks, absolutely give it a shot.  It’s terrific and I get tons of compliments. You can dress it up or wear it to the beach or toss on a pair of cutoffs—you’ll look great no matter what.I so, so wish sellers would stop desaturating the colors in their product images.  Most of the time you’re safest sticking with black, brown, or white, because that pretty sage green is going to show up at your front door looking like a shamrock shake on St. Paddy’s Day.  My first purchase was an apricot in size M and it’s extremely bright.  Not a color I’d ever choose to wear, vaguely circus peanut tbh, but in the picture it looks lovely.  Maybe I can dye it?  We’ll see.Next was a khaki in a size S.  My reasoning was that with most loose knit crocheted items like this, over time, the weave loosens up and the garment ends up at least a size bigger, sometimes more. The medium hangs nicely but is a bit boxy, so I thought I’d give the small a try.  Trouble here is the v neck is way high on the small, which I’m not a fan of.  So the color was right, but the size was wrong, though I’m hoping after ten washes it’ll be a bit larger than it is currently.  Not sure the neckline will ever be where I want it, but…Picked it up in a black size medium just to get the deeper neckline and initially it looked right.Wish that the seller could adjust the piece, so that the neckline hits at basically the same spot as the others.Edited to add: Sizing is so irregular and inconsistent you want to scream.  After two washes in cold water and a gentle stretch followed by an air dry draped over a clothes rack, it became plain that my third time’s the charm sweater, the black medium? exactly the same size as the khaki small.  Neckline is also the same.Please get a handle on sizing and it will be the perfect sweater.  Adorable but painful that I can’t get the fit I want.
I ordered this in pink and loved it so much I ordered another one… works with everything jeans,dresses etc
So cute and comfy on! Got lots of compliments when I wore it
This sweater is pretty and versatile for year round wear.

Purchased this for a boho outfit for a themed party. Based on other reviews I was excited to get this but was a little disappointed.  The shirt itself smelt when it arrived. Had just a fresh printer strong smell and felt like it had just been washed in product. I ordered a XL top and felt this runs large. I’m 5’8”, weigh 200lbs, and a 40 cup for reference. Normally I have to get xl-1x tops. This ran large and I felt like it was not as flattering on me.  I will be returning because of the fit and for almost $40 I would not wear again.
Runs true to size but size up if you prefer very loose.  I would normally order an XL but wasn’t available so I ordered the L.  I’m 185 pounds and 5’9”.  It’s super cute.

评论概述: Cute, TTS, delicate, received the wrong color
评论详情: I really like this! I’m 5’10”, 36G and I ordered an XL, I’m a L in tops in stores, sometimes an XL if it’s tight or has buttons, but I wasn’t convinced on the sizing and liked the oversized look on the model. I probably could have done with a L, but the material drapes nicely and still shows your figure. It does feel very delicate, I’m worried about snagging it. I ordered the brick red but was sent orange. I just assumed the color was misrepresented and wore it, so it’s too late to send it back. It’s not too cropped for my long torso and the cinching in the front is very adjustable/flattering.

评论概述: As advertised. Runs a little large.
评论详情: Fit as expected. Very flattering. Must wear something underneath like a bandage top or tank top, which is exactly the look I was going for. The material feels nice and thick and not cheap. I only wish the adjuster string was more to the side so it laid more comfortably or you could tuck it away, because it’s LONG. I’m going to have to play with it to set it to the length I like and then get the string secured and tucked away so I don’t have to do it every time. But that’s not really a complaint, more so an observation. The pictures advertised it as it is so I knew what I was getting and as not at all upset. Would buy other colors. Runs large.

I was hoping that the picture matched the product and it did! I love how you can customize this sweater, depending on your venue or mood. It's a perfect top for leisure or work. Add a cute little tank under it and it's perfect for work. I have already washed this sweater once and it went through the washer just fine and then I air dried. It maintained its form. Just followed the washing instructions. Recommend!!!
